entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Longueuil
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
